title: Multi-Sector Lead Generator Input
description: Generate business leads for different sectors using a single Apify actor.

sector.title: Sector
sector.description: Select the industry sector for which leads should be generated.

city.title: City (Optional)
city.description: Target city or location for lead generation. Leave empty for broader search.

postcode.title: Postcode/ZIP Code
postcode.description: Optional postcode or ZIP code for more precise location targeting (e.g., 600001, 110001).

keyword.title: Keyword (Optional)
keyword.description: Refine search within the selected sector (e.g., 'Dermatologist' for Healthcare, 'Builder' for Real Estate). Leave empty to use default sector keywords.

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of leads to generate.
